name: Think Different?
description:
Think Different? A simple platformer game mixed up with puzzles. Think and make your way out of each level with a simple cube.

Any questions or just wanna hang out? Join my Discord, click here!

My first game ever! I never made game, only thing I could do before this was moving objects using a tutorial, and now I learned so much. This game isn't meant to be a winner, good looking or extremely nice to play. I just wanted to learn new things, and that's what I did. Now I can start making a real game with cool game-play and art.
